column5: Anyone been out to find some early slabs yet?
Not yet but after this nice weather they should start soon...
The lake I'm planning fishing is still frozen solid
nuthin.... I would've gotten skunked if not for a small rock bass that pitied me
I would be under the impression most places that are worthwhile are still frozen as well.
Maybe I'm targeting the wrong places!  lol
This saturday I'm going to take the kids out for some pannies!
I've been catching them in open water for two weeks now. You just need to know where to look but that is always the case.  Good Luck.
Lake gibson in the back bays
I'm on the st. Lawrence and she's pretty much wide open...
